pkgmetadata.longdescription: # file_and_string_encryption[GitHub](https://github.com/ICreedenI/file_and_string_encryption) | [PyPI](https://pypi.org/project/file-and-string-encryption) Simple encryption functions. Do not simply trust this code! Pay attention to how you handle sensitive information!Included functions:- encrypt_directory- encrypt_file- encrypt_file_with_password- decrypt_directory- decrypt_file- decrypt_file_with_password- encrypt_string_with_password- decrypt_string_with_password- generate_password- get_random_key
